items.title: Sherwin-Williams to Announce Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results on July 22, 2025
items.description: CLEVELAND,-- The Sherwin-Williams Company will issue a press release announcing its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025, prior to market open on Tuesday, July 22, 2025. At...

items.title: Citi Downgrades Sherwin-Williams (SHW) on Housing Market Concerns
items.description: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) is one of the top 10 materials stocks to buy according to analysts. On June 13, Citi lowered its rating on Sherwin-Williams stock from Buy to Neutral, citing concerns about the housing market’s future prospects. The firm also reduced its price target from $405.00 to $385.00. Citi analysts pointed to “sustained […]

items.title: 3 Champion Dividend Stocks Raising Dividends for Over 25 Years
items.author: Bob Ciura
items.description: The article highlights three dividend champion stocks - Emerson Electric, Sherwin-Williams, and Sonoco Products - that have consistently raised dividends for over 25 years, demonstrating financial resilience and strong performance.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Strong Q2 earnings, revenue growth, strategic acquisitions, global customer base, and a safe dividend with low payout ratio
Consistent earnings growth, margin expansion, positive 2025 guidance, and potential for 7% annualized earnings growth
49-year dividend growth streak, revenue growth from acquisitions, reasonable dividend payout ratio, and improved quarterly performance
